name: Nuclear Mountain
description:
PowerPoint Game with Rail Shooter Mechanics!

Versions:

  1. first prototype (#minibeansjam2)
  2. polished and with more story, but still without sounds
  3. even more polished and now with sound effects

Devlog:

  • Soundeffekte zur "Präsentation" hinzufügen
  • Montage einer Rail-Shooter-Sequenz in PowerPoint
  • Ein paar Screenshots von der Modellierung

Have fun! :-)
